findings.title: MVN - Misleading Variables Naming
findings.description: Variables can have misleading names if their names do not accurately reflect the value they contain or the purpose they serve.

findings.title: VO - Variable Optimization
findings.description: The variable _DECIMALS is represented in uint256 but can be optimized to uint8.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables that initialize only in the constructor are not defined as immutable.
findings.location: Contract FROG, variables initialized in the constructor

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.
findings.location: Contract FROG, state variables that never change

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.
findings.location: Contract FROG, function and variable names

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: All required events are missing in the contract.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is never executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are missing proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly can be error-prone and should be used sparingly.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma is not locked to a specific compiler version.
